title: No mystery gift

replies.body: It's only been a few days. At least wait until it's like a week since the announcement before making threads like this. The system is unlikely to skip over you assuming you meet the requirements just wait a while. If it hasn't come in like 3-4 days from now make a support ticket and explain the situation, posting on the forums won't really help.
Why would it take multiple days to do? Do they get the work experience kid to sort through it instead of using a computer program?
because there are many players in OCE and it may take some time, I haven't received mine yet either

>because there are many players in OCE

The lack of Dominion disturbs me on a level deeper than anything imaginable.

Riot's systems are notoriously inefficient for things like this. Giving out random free skins to every summoner with a clean record isn't exactly a routine task, and the last thing they'd want is for someone to feel cheated by getting an extremely bad skin, or for a toxic player to accidentally get a reward.

Have some patience. It's just a stupid skin, not really relevant to your enjoyment of the game in any way. Not really trying to apologise for Riot's actions, but we don't need idiots like you spamming the forums when it's only been 3 days (when they specifically STATED it'd take a few days).
